detail_desc: Leggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and short legs.
Hat in braided straw with a patterned fabric band and bow at the back. Lined. Width of brim 4.5 cm.
Water bottle in plastic with a print motif. Handle and non-drip lid with a straw.
3/4-length microfibre leggings with an elasticated waist and narrow elastication at the hems.
V-neck top in a double layer of crêpe with narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back. Gently flared style.
Bodysuits in soft cotton jersey with a round, picot-trimmed neckline, lapped shoulders, long puff sleeves and press-studs at the crotch.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves that taper at the cuffs and wide ribbing around the neckline.

Short parka in washed cotton twill with a drawstring hood, zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, and press-studs at the cuffs. Side pockets with a press-stud, and a drawstring at the waist. Unlined.
Imitation leather sandals with an adjustable ankle strap with a hook and loop fastening. Imitation leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Vest top in slub linen jersey with a deep neckline at the front.
5-pocket, calf-length skirt in cotton denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and slit at the front. Unlined.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with sequined embroidery and buttons down the front. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Push-up bra top in lace with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Lace front and back, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a metal fastener at the front and at the neckline.

Waterproof hi-tops in imitation leather with a padded edge and tongue, elasticated lacing at the front and a hook and loop tab at the top. Loop at the front and back and chunky, patterned soles. Height of soles 2.3 cm.
Slim-fit, high-waisted trousers in imitation leather with a visible zip at the front.
Flip-flops with rubber straps and fluted ethylene-vinyl acetate (EVA) soles.

Dress in an organic cotton weave with a rounded collar and sleeve trims in a contrasting colour. Short, puff sleeves, concealed press-studs at the back, a gathered seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Inner bodysuit with press-studs at the crotch and narrow elastication around the hems.

Long blouse in a patterned cotton weave with a V-neck, small stand-up collar and twisted ties with tasselled ends. Dropped shoulders, 3/4-length sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Straight-cut hem with slits in the sides.
Three-strand neckline of thin metal chains with two pendants. Adjustable length, 39-47 cm.
Pyjama shorts in soft, patterned jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist with a small frill trim at the top.
5-pocket, knee-length shorts in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details. Regular waist, zip fly and button and slim legs with frayed, raw-edge hems.

Dungarees in soft sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend with shoulder straps that fasten at the front, concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs, and ribbed hems. Partly lined.
Cotton jersey T-shirt with a print motif on the front decorated with studs and polished plastic beads. Raw-edge neckline, sleeves and hem.

Blouse in cotton poplin with a collar, concealed buttons at the front and 3/4-length sleeves with a wide, flared flounce and button at the cuffs. Yoke with pleats at the back and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short-sleeved body in jersey crêpe with a collar, V-neck and covered buttons at the top. Cap sleeves and a gathered seam below the waist with a jersey lower section. Press-studs at the crotch.
Clutch bag in textured velour with a flap and metal buckle, a narrow, detachable metal chain shoulder strap and a zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size 4x25x16 cm.

Short-sleeved shirt in a spotted premium cotton weave with a turn-down collar, French front and rounded hem. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Dress in crêped modal with an all-over print and button placket. Elasticated seam at the waist with decorative bow and long sleeves with elasticated cuffs. Unlined.
Cardigan in a soft cotton knit with a V-neck and buttons down the front.
Fine-knit jumper with a boat neck, dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Hat in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend.
Short, fitted dress in mesh with beaded embroidery. Opening with a button at the back of the neck and long sleeves. Jersey lining dress with narrow shoulder straps.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with a wrapover front and press-studs down one side and at the crotch.
Large, thin metal hoop earrings. Diameter 7.5 cm.
Sleeveless playsuit in viscose jersey with a V-neck front and back and narrow shoulder straps. Elasticated seam at the waist with decorative twisted ties with tassels, and short, wide legs.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with a wrapover front and press-studs at the sides and crotch.

Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a high waist and wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Sculpting seams at the back that showcase the body’s physique. Key pocket in the waistband.
Bikini top and bottoms. Top with narrow shoulder straps and a double-layer front with a laser-cut pattern and a gold-coloured metal decoration. Fully lined bottoms with laser-cut, scalloped edges.
Triangle bikini top with removable inserts and narrow shoulder straps that link together into a racer back and tie at the back.
Lined, non-wired triangle bikini top with a small metal ring at the front. Adjustable shoulder straps, cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and ties at the back.

Trainers in mesh with imitation leather details, a lightly padded edge and tongue, elasticated lacing and a hook and loop tab at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and press-studs at the crotch.
Short-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey an appliqué on the front and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Calf-length dress in a silk blend with a V-neck and sewn-in wrapover at the front. Long sleeves, wide cuffs with covered buttons, a seam at the waist and a wide, detachable tie belt. Unlined.
Jumper in a chunky knit with a stand-up collar, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Short dress in airy chiffon with lace in a straight cut with pin-tucks at the top, an opening and button at the back of the neck and long sleeves with lace and embroidery at the cuffs. Gathered seam at the waist and a bell-shaped skirt with lace and embroidery at the hem. Jersey underdress.
Tube scarf in faux fur with a twisted detail at the front.
Top in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with embroidery around the neckline and long sleeves with a small frill trim.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waist panel that is elasticated at the top to provide space for the tummy.
Jumper in soft, rib-knit chenille with long, wide raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Scarf in a soft, loose weave with fringes on the short sides. Size 100x200 cm.
Sleeveless jumpsuit in satin with narrow shoulder straps and an opening with two buttons at the back. Elasticated waist with a detachable tie belt, side pockets and wide, straight legs. Unlined.
Polo shirt in patterned, stretch cotton jersey with a ribbed collar, button placket and short sleeves with ribbed trims.
Chunky metal curb chain bracelet with a trigger clasp.

Short, off-the-shoulder dress in a lightweight stretch cotton weave with a sheen. Elastication with decorative gathers at the shoulders and 3/4-length raglan sleeves with trumpet cuffs and ties. Unlined.

Shirt in a linen and cotton weave with a concealed button-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke with a pleat at the back, and a rounded hem. Slim fit – a modern fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a sequin and glittery thread motif on the front and short, double-flounced sleeves in tulle.
Short, A-line skirt with a high waist and buttons down the front.
High-waisted shorts in washed, stretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and short slits in the sides.
Sleeveless blouse in a viscose weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Chest pocket, yoke with a pleat at the back, and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Set with a dress and leggings in cotton. Dress in woven fabric with buttons down the front, a yoke, long sleeves with concealed elastication and a small frill trim at the cuffs, and a flared skirt. Patterned jersey leggings with covered elastication at the waist.

Pyjamas with a shirt and shorts in a patterned viscose weave. Shirt with a resort collar, French front and short sleeves. Shorts with an elasticated, drawstring waist, fake fly and pockets in the side seams.
Slightly shorter jumper in a soft, fluffy knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Calf-length dress in an airy cotton weave with a linen feel. V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, and a fitted bodice with a concealed zip at the back and hook-and-eye fastener at the top. Gathered seam at the waist with an inset, hole-embroidered trim and a flared skirt with pin-tucks and inset, hole-embroidered trims. Lined in a soft cotton weave.
Sleeveless top in soft jersey containing some linen with a small, pleated frill trim around the armholes and gathers in the sides for best fit.
Shorts in a crêpe weave with a regular waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastener, side pockets and welt back pockets.
Shorts in lightweight organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, and contrasting colour trims and side stripes.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif.
Metal Alice band covered in sparkly stones.
Polo-neck tops in soft cotton jersey with long sleeves.
Satin tie. Width 6.5 cm.
Fitted dress in soft, ribbed jersey with a turtle neck and long sleeves.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets and a fake welt back pocket with a button.

Long dress in airy, patterned chiffon with a small stand-up collar, button placket and long sleeves with elasticated cuffs. Seam at the waist and a wide skirt with seams and gathers. Jersey underdress.
Fitted, sleeveless dress in ribbed jersey.
Padded sleep bag in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder and zip at one side. Jersey lining. The sleep bag is designed for indoor use only.
5-pocket trousers in stretch twill with a washed look, hard-worn details, a zip fly and button and tapered legs.
Wide, high-waisted shorts in woven fabric with a sewn-in tie belt and pleats at the top. Fly with a concealed zip, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.

Dress in a patterned viscose weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, an elasticated seam and decorative bow at the waist, and side pockets. Unlined.
